column4: You guys, you know what I realised today? Open Source software doesn't mean free software....
I mean to really compete with the big comanies out there, the people that design software for Linux need money
I came to Linux from the World of Apple. Not because apple sucks, but because I can't afford a Powerbook right now and I needed a viable OS solution for my Thinkpad
I agree. Ubuntu is a great distro for my HP zd8110, if I can get Breezy to f***ing work
